front.title: •Gold Leader In Gold 1
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot or passenger. Permanent pilot aboard is •Dutch, who provides ability of 2, adds 2 to power and may draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
front.lore: At the Battle of Yavin, Dutch led his squadron of outdated but reliable Y-wings in the first wave of the assault against the Death Star.

rulings: An opponent with no Force remaining may use 'Draws if unable to otherwise' text to draw battle destiny.
'Draws if unable to otherwise' text does not permit an opponent with Force remaining to avoid paying.
An opponent with 1 Force available and 'Draws 2 battle destiny if unable to otherwise' can draw both by paying for the first draw and making the second draw without paying.
An opponent with sufficient Force may still choose to pay for some battle destiny draws and not pay for others (the ones not paid for are prevented).
